thread.title: Nicolas Colsaerts makes par from the water hazard at Portugal Masters
thread.title_full: Nicolas Colsaerts makes par from the water hazard at Portugal Masters

author: Melissa Blanton
title: Nicolas Colsaerts makes par from the water hazard at Portugal Masters
text:
Nicolas Colsaerts makes par from the water hazard at Portugal Masters PGA 11 hrs ago Melissa Blanton Nicolas Colsaerts may not have won this week on the European Tour.
AdChoices But he did provide the week's best opportunity for a slow-motion replay.
Colsaerts was playing in the Portugal Masters Sunday when he hit his ball into the water on the par-5 12th.
Lucky for him -- and us -- he still had a shot.
Shoeless, pants rolled up, rain jacket on:
One of the best replays you'll see. #PortugalMasters https://t.co/JtCf83UnYz
— The European Tour (@EuropeanTour) October 18, 2015 Colsaerts would go on to make par on the hole.
This was his classy response to the incident.
The only entertainment i was able to provide today... see u in 2016 @EuropeanTour https://t.co/YjwgZsXEyU
— Nicolas Colsaerts (@Coelsss) October 18, 2015 While Colsaerts led after the first 18 holes, he would finish 14 shots behind the eventual winner, England's Andy Sullivan.
Sullivan shot a 23-under par in the weather-shortened event.
